task.title: Managing file transfer data
task.shortdesc: As with meeting recordings and reports, files that are shared in the chat are stored in a Docker volume or a Kubernetes persistent volume. By default, you can download these files within 90 days.

context.p:
You can modify the limit by updating the following files.
Docker
custom.env
Kubernetes
helm/values.yamlThe values are case sensitive and must be entered as shown below.

ol.li:
Modify the configuration file. The minimum value is 1.
For Docker environments, update the FILES_EXPIRE_IN_DAYS parameter. For example, FILES_EXPIRE_IN_DAYS=77 to indicate 77 days.
For Kubernetes environments, update the filesExpireInDays parameter. For example, filesExpireInDays: 77 to indicate 77 days.
Restart the Sametime server to apply the changes. For more information, refer to Starting and stopping servers.
